data.message: I am very interested in doing this for my Page, however the “continue” button will not react upon me filling out the desired fields. I have a good following on Facebook already, please assist if you can.

replies.message: Marshall Boyd no I simply need to verify my Public Figure Page/finish this app but it will not direct me forward with the continue.

Yeah. Their link directs for a business verification. I don’t intend to have work “stolen” either. Facebook is the reason I am still going and gave me the opportunity to do things I love and engage with thousands of my followers. I am proud to have this is a primary platform. I saw the potential long before many thought of it and put my work towards here instead of the typical twitch/YouTube and it has proven to be and will continue to be my favorite focus of engaging with my audience!
